definition: only/just (i.e. it is only that...)/all except/unique

sentences.english: Lord, let this your little flock, Your name alone confessing.
sentences.chinese: 哦，主啊，讓你這羣小羊，唯獨承認你的聖名。

sentences.english: The office of priest -king was reserved by God for the Messiah, the Lord Jesus alone.
sentences.chinese: 祭司兼君王的位置，上帝唯獨保留給彌賽亞主耶穌。

sentences.english: But what we can't forget are those memories we hidden in the bag.
sentences.chinese: 唯獨忘不掉的是，藏在書包裏的那些回憶。

sentences.english: But Amy appear some solitary zero point zero a person.
sentences.chinese: 唯獨艾米顯得有些孤零點零的一個人。

sentences.english: Only in China, however, did young people actually have more friends online than offline.
sentences.chinese: 但唯獨在中國，年輕人線上的好友數超過真實好友。

sentences.english: Bue one man loved the pilgrim soul in you.
sentences.chinese: 唯獨一愛你那朝聖者的心。

sentences.english: I've been touched by how much the audience, but not you.
sentences.chinese: 被我感動的聽衆何其多，卻唯獨沒有你。

sentences.english: In all of creation, only human beings are made “in God's image.
sentences.chinese: 在所有受造物中，唯獨人是按着神的形象被造的。

sentences.english: All matters could the good scabs forget to hurt, the only love was not good.
sentences.chinese: 全部旳事都能好le傷疤忘le疼，唯獨愛情不行。

sentences.english: No one hears their cries—no one but God, who hears and is merciful.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人能聽到他們的哀告，唯獨慈愛的神能聽到。

sentences.english: Let them be for yourself alone, and not for sharing with strangers.
sentences.chinese: 唯獨歸你一人，不可與外人同用。

sentences.english: Youth will break, but memory lasts forever.
sentences.chinese: 青春終將散場，唯獨記憶永垂不朽。

sentences.english: Let me be homo unius libri: "A man of one book."
sentences.chinese: 讓我成爲唯獨精通這一本書的人吧。

sentences.english: Saving faith is faith which alone apprehends Christ, his righteousness, and merits.
sentences.chinese: 得救的信心是唯獨領悟基督，祂的義和功德。

sentences.english: The other people all in to have a meal, but xiaoyan run to give everybody end dish.
sentences.chinese: 別人都在喫飯，唯獨曉燕跑來跑去給大家端菜。

sentences.english: But beans and squashes don't become gods - why does maize?
sentences.chinese: 那爲什麼豆類與瓜類都成不了神，唯獨玉米可以呢？
